txt.en: 'What began in celebration might have ended in a declaration of war, had it not been for Wandalb who was able to steer the Men and dwarves back from the brink of battle.'
'All the guests arrived, excited to meet the one who had slain Scatha, the Worm. The feast began with lively song and joyous laughter....'
'All the guests arrived, excited to meet the one who had slain Scatha, the Worm.'
'What began in celebration, almost ended in a declaration of war.'
Léothred, the Rohirric scholar, wishes to learn more of the political tensions that arose during Fram's reign over the Ai-thúda.
